name: Mama's 2-Pack
description:
Mama serves up twice the motion-based fun! Use the Wii Remote as your universal untensil to chop, grind, slice and stir your way to kitchen supremacy in these best-selling Mama classics.
Cooking Mama World Kitchen: Mama gets a 3D makeover along with 50 new recipes including ginger pork and fruit gelatin. Customize your kitchen and fix mistakes in silly new kitchen mini-games.
Cooking Mama Cook Off: Use 300 ingredients to create 55 recipes, from hot dogs to pan fried crab. Challenge a friend to the ultimate cook off!
